label: This page begins the optional stuff. These questions help us keep presentations relevant - we have a whole spectrum of content in computer and physical security to pull from, and we want to know what will benefit the most people.
These questions concentrate on what experience people have with computers, computer security, and generally breaking (into) things.
We'll try to keep this as fun as possible.

elements.label: "Hacking" Experience
elements.caption: How much do you know about computer security?
